live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 3:45pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
43771.summary: Some customers in the Victoria Park area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43771.title: Nov 8 – Calgary (Victoria Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
